description:
Poke a Beaver brings a cartoonish beaver to life with a simple poke.  Love it or Hate it you just don't want to miss it.

"Very under rated... I like it... It's simple... It's silly.. It's Poke A Beaver"

"Perhaps the worst app in history. Poke A Beaver is the reason Palm went out of business."

"Lol rofl! It is so hilarious how sad this is..but still, if you quickly poke it repeatedly it sounds hilarious"

"This app makes me want to drop kick a small child."

"Best app ever!! I love poking beavers!!!!"

"I'd RATHER BOIL WATER WITH A FORK IN IT AND POKE MY EYE OUT WITH IT"

"So bad it's good, I hope this bad boy wins $100,000. Does exactly what I expected it to do."

"Poke a beaver haha best app hands down!!!"
